answers.answer: Just means they will do the same test again, but take ur blood after 1hour, 2hours and 3hours.  I failed mine and I no have to ***** my finger 3timea a day to make sure my sugar levels are with in the right range. I'm controlling my diabetes with food. Fingers crossed your test will be fine. :-)
I know alot of people who failed the 1hr but passed the 3hr. Try not to worry or stress about it.
